Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Move fast save more with MongoDB-compatible workloads on DocumentDB | BRK132
Description:
DocumentDB, the open-source MongoDB-compatible document database now part of the Linux Foundation, helps you innovate faster and save more. Customers like Kraft Heinz move fast with a JSON-native model, reduce ops with turnkey scaling and updates, and secure workloads with enterprise-grade protection and an E2E Azure SLA. Delivered as a fully managed service with support for hybrid and multicloud, Azure DocumentDB keeps you moving faster while crushing costs at enterprise scale.

Chapters: 0:00 - Introduction to Open Source DocumentDB and Portability Across Clouds 00:03:42 - Demo: LLM-Based Index Advisor and Query Optimization Using AI 00:10:06 - Migrating collections such as Sample Restaurants database 00:11:00 - Verifying data transfer using VS Code extension 00:11:37 - Introducing AI-ready features: LLM-based Index Advisor and KNN support 00:19:56 - Overview of Cosmos AI Graph architecture and its components 00:25:17 - Examples demonstrating deterministic vs. semantic discovery queries and hybrid search 00:29:50 - Explanation of Multi-Cloud and Hybrid Cloud Capabilities 00:33:04 - Session Wrap-Up and Getting Started Options
